knimeNode.name: RuleSet Predictor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Applies the rules to the input table.

fullDescription.intro: This node takes a data table and a PMML model for RuleSets, e.g. create by the PMML Rule Editor node, and predicts a new column according to the rules.
fullDescription.option: Should the confidence of the result be computed?

ports.inPort: An input table with compatible columns to the PMML rules.
ports.outPort: The table with the column with predicted values.
